## error() function

Error function. Prints a console error. Only works in debug mode, otherwise it does nothing.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function error(error: string | Error, data?: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  error | <code>string &#124; Error</code> | string or Error object. |
|  data | <code>any</code> | any debug information. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
